pages.text: Dark Utilities (or DarkUtils for short) adds a bunch of plates and Mob Filters that will help you with mob farms.
The base plate. Lots of different plates can be made from this, from the speedy Vector Plate to the dangerous Flame Trap.

pages.title: Entity Filters
pages.text: There are many kinds of entity filters. They all have similar recipes, the only difference being the item in the middle. They can be inverted by shift-right-clicking and toggled with redstone.
Dark Glass is transparent, but doesn't let light through it. Useful for viewing windows into dark spawning rooms. Not very realistic, but who cares?
Sleep Charms enable you to go to sleep faster and slower decrease the Insomnia (Phantom-spawning) counter. It doesn't have to be in a Curio slot to work.
Ender Hoppers absorb dropped items into whatever inventory it is attached to.
